definition: the highest of the four varnas: the priestly or sacerdotal category
details:
noun
- the highest of the four varnas: the priestly or sacerdotal category
= synonyms: brahmin
- a member of the highest of the four Hindu varnas
= example: a member of the highest of the four Hindu varnas
= synonyms: brahmin
- a member of a social and cultural elite (especially a descendant of an old New England family)
= example: a member of a social and cultural elite (especially a descendant of an old New England family)
= synonyms: brahmin
